scripts.watch: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-js
scripts.watch-sass: node-sass -w style/static.scss -o public/static & node-sass -w style/motion.scss -o public/motion
scripts.sass: node-sass style/static.scss > public/static/ && node-sass style/motion.scss > public/motion/
scripts.build: browserify lib/main.js > public/bundle.js && npm run sass
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix public origin master
